metadata.title: Avengers Mens Graphite Heather Sleep Pants XL
features: Perfect Gift - Treat Yourself or make this Marvel Comics Original Avengers Print Men's Loungewear Lounge Pants the perfect gift for someone awesome.
Great Feel - You like to keep it casual, so these soft pants will be perfect.
Officially Licensed - Great for Marvel Comics and Captain America fans.
Made For Comfort - Recommended for men of all ages.
description: Experience a supersoldier enhanced by an experimental serum to aid the United States government in World War 2. Centered on the left leg of these pants is the Marvel Comics Original Avengers. These soft men's lounge pants are made from a cotton/poly blend, offering the most comfort possible.
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "9 x 7 x 1 inches; 11.2 Ounces", "Item model number": "ZQ3M8YMVL", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "August 12, 2015"}
